title: Ticket #1676: Out of source builds w/cmake
description: Verify the ability to perform out of source builds. e.g. source tree remains untainted and build elements and generation are done in a separate location. This is highly useful for multiple reasons.
remarks:
Just for you guys I stayed up late last night to get out-of-source builds ~95% complete.

The only minor issue I can see is the output of classads because it is treated as an in-source external (which I may need to change).

Also, there is nothing I can do about condor_tests because they are so highly tied to local relative path.
